dict.string: Copyright 2008 Kosada Incorporated. All rights reserved.

This patch receives broadcast DMX values from the specified Sub-Net and Universe.
In order to receive ArtDmx packets, one of your computer's network interfaces must be set to a valid Art-Net IP Subnet. These are as follows:
* 2.0.0.0/8 (network 2.0.0.0, netmask 255.0.0.0, broadcast 2.255.255.255) * 10.0.0.0/8 (network 10.0.0.0, netmask 255.0.0.0, broadcast 10.255.255.255)
If none of your computer's network interfaces are set accordingly, Art-Net packets will not be received.
http://kineme.net/

When enabled, the Channel Structure values will be provided as floating-point values ranging from 0 to 1.
When disabled, the Channel Structure values will be provided as integer values ranging from 0 to 255.
A keyed structure â€” the structure's key represents the output ArtDmx channel (1 to 512), and the structure's value represents the value to send to that channel (0 to 255, or 0 to 1 if Normalized).
